eu_initiatives: We are particularly interested in policies on competition, health, sustainability and environmental protection.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Green retail; empowering youth (creating opportunities for young people through our skills programme Opportunity Youth); responsible sourcing and our membership of the Sustainable Coffee Challenge which aims to bring the coffee commodity to full global sustainability.
goals__remit: Starbucks is a global coffee company that imports, roasts and serves coffee, food and other beverages to customers in over 3000 stores across the EMEA region.
